I know Yahoo Groups was down all day yesterday and there was no 
announcement about it so I am going to give this topic another boot.

This week we are talking about skeletons and ghosts.

I'll add one comment: For high experience level skeletons, "tunnel" 
attack produces the same results as teleportation except you can't 
leave a marker.  High experience level skeletons can't use a drop of 
mana even when time is frozen.
